content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [abfss_ds_acl_test] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'abfss://fssynwrls999@stgsynwrkls999.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE       = HADOOP--, 
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE test_external_data_acl_COLOMBIA
(
RequestID	[varchar](255)		,
SPRAS	[varchar](255)		,
COKEY	[varchar](255)		,
LTEXT	[varchar](255)		
)
WITH (LOCATION='COL/DS_UC_COKEY_TEXT.CSV',
    DATA_SOURCE = [abfss_ds_acl_test],  
    FILE_FORMAT = FF_TEXTFORMAT_DEMO,
    REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
    REJECT_VALUE = 0
)


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM test_external_data_acl
GO
